channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sofa still dumped, rug & mattress added, 5th October
item.description:
I reported abused sofa. The update says it has been fixed but it is still there. A rug and mattress have also been dumped in this same location

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Tarbert Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned van no tax, 5th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dulwich Wood Avenue, London

item.title: Dangerous material on pathway on residential road, 5th October
item.description:
Fly tipping has spilled onto the council-owned/maintained pathway, in particular dangerous shards of broken glass of various sizes. This path runs in front of residential homes and is walking route for young children, including primary school pupils attending nearby Ivydale School. This has been present for 24 hours

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harlescott Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
